cethric.xge.engine.scene.object

Interface IRenderable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IMesh, IMeshManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Cube, Mesh, MeshManager, Object

    public interface IRenderable
    Created by blakerogan on 14/03/15.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void render(com.hackoeur.jglm.Mat4 V, com.hackoeur.jglm.Mat4 P, ShaderProgram shaderProgram)
      Called every time the frame needs to be rendered.
      void setup()
      Setup the OpenGL and Bullet content as well as any other content that needs to be setup after creation
      void teardown()
      Remove any content that this object no longer needs as it will be deleted.
      void update(long delta)
      Called on every update tick

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(long delta)
        Called on every update tick
        Parameters:
        delta - long; time since last update

      • render

        void render(com.hackoeur.jglm.Mat4 V,
            com.hackoeur.jglm.Mat4 P,
            ShaderProgram shaderProgram)
        Called every time the frame needs to be rendered.
        Parameters:
        V - Mat4; Projection * View matrix. times the model matrix to get the MVP matrix.
        P - Mat4; Projection * View matrix. times the model matrix to get the MVP matrix.
        shaderProgram - ShaderProgram; the attached shader program that renders this cube.

      • setup

        void setup()
        Setup the OpenGL and Bullet content as well as any other content that needs to be setup after creation

      • teardown

        void teardown()
        Remove any content that this object no longer needs as it will be deleted.
